dmca.title: FreeIndex Objects to re-Index
dmca.body:
Dear Google

Our site www.freeindex.co.uk, a UK business directory, has been completely copied and the content / data duplicated without our consent either verbally or in writing by the following web site.

http://ukcompanies.wemovedpro.com/

Every page on site is constructed entirely based on data directly taken from the FreeIndex.co.uk.  We have not listed each URL as there are literally tens of thousands of pages.  They are also using adsense to potentially earn income from the site. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing Web pages is not authorised by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

If possible can you help us find out more about the people who have set this site up, as we are unable to view any information about them via DNS record lookup.  Obviously we would like to get the site shut down.

[signature]
Thank you for your help with this issue.

[private]
Managing Director
www.FreeIndex.co.uk
